:v-model.description: You can bind the value of the input box bidirectionally
:v-model.description_zh: 可以双向绑定输入框的值

icon.description: The icon to the left of the label is limited to the name of the uView icon
icon.description_zh: label左边的图标，限uView的图标名称

border-bottom.description: Whether to display the lower border of the field

border-top.description: Whether to display the upper border of the field

right-icon.description: Enter the icon name on the right side of the input box, limited to the icon name of uView
right-icon.description_zh: 输入框右边的图标名称，限uView的图标名称

required.description: If it is required, a red "*" sign will be displayed on the left
required.description_zh: 是否必填，左边显示红色"*"号

label.description: A text prompt to the left of the input box
label.description_zh: 输入框左边的文字提示

password.description: Whether the password input method (replace text with dots) is valid when type is text
password.description_zh: 是否密码输入方式(用点替换文字)，type为text时有效

clearable.description: Whether to display the icon control on the right to clear the content (the input box has content and is displayed only when it is focused), click to clear the content of the input box
clearable.description_zh: 是否显示右侧清空内容的图标控件(输入框有内容，且获得焦点时才显示)，点击可清空输入框内容

label-width.description: The width of the label, in rpx

icon-color.description: The color of the icon on the left that is configured via icon
icon-color.description_zh: 左边通过icon配置的图标的颜色

clear-size.description: Clear the size of the icon, in rpx

field-style.description: Enter the style of the field, the form of the object
field-style.description_zh: 输入框的样式，对象形式

auto-height.description: Whether to automatically increase the input area, which is valid when the type is set to textarea
auto-height.description_zh: 是否自动增高输入区域，type为textarea时有效

error-message.description: If the displayed error message is an empty string or false, the error message is not displayed
error-message.description_zh: 显示的错误提示内容，如果为空字符串或者false，则不显示错误信息

placeholder.description: Tooltip text for the input box

placeholder-style.description: placeholder的样式(内联样式，字符串)，如"color: #ddd"
placeholder-style.description_zh: placeholder的样式(内联样式，字符串)，如"color: #ddd"

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

fixed.description: If type is textarea and is in the "position:fixed" area, this parameter must be true
fixed.description_zh: 如果type为textarea，且在一个"position:fixed"的区域，需要指明为true

disabled.description: Whether it is not available for input

maxlength.description: The maximum input length is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

confirm-type.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard to take effect only when type="text".
confirm-type.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅在type="text"时生效

trim.description: Whether to automatically remove spaces at both ends
trim.description_zh: 是否自动去除两端的空格

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the left

slots.name: right
slots.description: Customize the content on the right
